#summary Diff of the API between different firmware versions

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= Introduction =
The API diff is generated by comparing the result from [http://code.google.com/p/class-dump-x/ class-dump-x] in different firmware binaries from the SDK. Please note that:
 * The changes in C `struct`s and C++ `class`es will not be recorded.
 * Implementation changes will not be recorded. You need to decompile to know.
 * Sometimes changes in interface is because a subclass decided to provide a specified treatment, e.g. the `-[UIWebView setBounds:]` message in 2.1. This does not mean `-[UIWebView setBounds:]` is not found in 2.0, but only that `-[UIWebView setBounds:]` was directly inherited from `-[UIView setBounds:]` in that version.
 * Setters (-`set`_XXX_:) and getters (-_XXX_) are merged into one single `@property` when possible, but this does not necessarily mean the messages are declared as a property in the implementation.
 * ivar layout changes may be incomplete. You are advised *not* to use ivars when using these classes anyway. If ivars are added to the end of the list, it won't be recorded.
